Package net.nextinfinity.core

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • net.nextinfinity.core.Game

  • public abstract class Game
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    The Game class forms the base for games using InfinityCore. The main plugin class of games should extend Game (this class) in lieu of JavaPlugin.
    All game-specific initialization should be done in setup(), as other methods should not be overridden.
    Individual games must contain:
    - all game-specific mechanics
    - death management, respawning or removing dead players (GameDeathEvent)
    - scoring - the methods are provided but it is up to the game to actually add points
    In general the game should interact with InfinityCore using net.nextinfinity.core.events where possible. Only the Arena and GamePlayer implementations are intended to be modified.
